municoder 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Package index

All functions

clear_cache()
Clear all cached API results
.municoder_cache
Cached versions of API functions for improved performance
get_client_content()
Obtain metadata for a jurisdiction's regulatory documents hosted on Municode
get_client_content_cached()
Get client content with caching
get_client_metadata()
Client-related API functions Returns metadata about a given client
get_client_metadata_cached()
Get client metadata with caching
get_clients_in_state()
Return metadata for all Municode clients in a given state
get_clients_in_state_cached()
Get clients in a state with caching
get_codes_content()
Code-related API functions (current ordinance versions) Get text and metadata for a given node within a given ordinance
get_codes_toc()
Get the Table of Contents for an ordinance
get_codes_toc_breadcrumb()
Get information about a given node's ancestor(s)
get_codes_toc_children()
Get information about a given node's children
get_core_content_ordinances()
Ordinance-related API functions (historical ordinance versions) Return information about all ordinances of a given type for a given year
get_jobs_latest()
Get data on the most recent job
get_jobs_product()
Job-related API functions Returns data on all jobs for a given product
get_jurisdiction_products()
Get all products for a jurisdiction in one step
get_ordinance_section()
Workflow helper functions for common multi-step operations Get ordinance section content in one step
get_ordinance_toc()
Get full table of contents for an ordinance in one step
get_ordinances_toc()
Obtain metadata about a given ordinance over time
get_ordinances_toc_breadcrumb()
Get the ancestors of a given node in an ordinance's Table of Contents
get_ordinances_toc_children()
Get the children of a given node in an ordinance's Table of Contents
get_product_metadata()
Product-related API functions Get metadata about a specified product
get_product_metadata_cached()
Get product metadata with caching
get_states()
State-related API functions Return metadata about states (and similar) as used by municode
get_states_abbreviation()
Look up state metadata given a state abbreviation
get_states_cached()
Get states with caching
